attributes.action: Offer a referendum on the restoration of Corporal Punishment for certain offences .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such offences would be: Crimes of violence, Domestic violence,physical and sexual abuse of children,violent attacks and fraud against the elderly,serious anti-social behavior such as vadalism etc. We have tried it the easy way without success..........lets try the hard way for a year or two and see what develops!!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/antisocialacts/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
